text: Charles William Ramsden (11 June 1904 – 16 February 1975) was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Bucklow, Cheshire. He played for Rotherham Town, Stockport County, Manchester North End, and Manchester United. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1904 births Category:1975 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Stockport County F.C. players Category:Manchester North End F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: Charlie Ramsden
